segments.text: Excuse me , I ’ m sorry to trouble you . My name is Susan Ransom , and I have placed several orders with you company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Mr . Ransom ? This is Karl Miller . How may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I wonder if you could track an order I placed with you last month . It hasn ’ t arrived yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , Ms . Ransom . Do you have an order number ?
segments.speaker: S2
